intro:
Battle head-to-head with up to 4 players in this exciting action game!
Get more money than anyone else!
description:
The year is 2039...
All money is now collected and managed through an online network known as Gold Asset.
This includes money generated through illegal and exploitative avenues.
And so a plan was concocted to return that money to the world...

Jewel Rush is a fighting action game that can be played by up to 4 players.

The rules are simple, so anyone can play casually, or more seriously.
Collect the Jewels, which are pieces of financial data, and cash them in!
The aim of the game is to collect more money than anyone else.

In Free Battle mode, you can with up to 4 players.
Perfect for whether you want to gather friends, or play others all over the world online.
Battle your friends and family in this action packed heist!

In the single-player Story Mode, play through each stage and watch the adventures of our four
intriguing heroes unfold!
Yuichi Endo, descendant of Heikichi Endo, the fiend with twenty faces. 
Frederica Mina Lupin, descendant of the phantom thief, Arsene Lupin.
Kichijiro Nezu, descendant of the chivalrous thief, Jirokichi "Nezumi Kozo".
Shieru Ishikawa, descendant of the legendary thief, Goemon Ishikawa.

There are two difficulties to choose from, so even beginners to action games will be able
to pick it up straight away!
